comment: very very nice, easy to talk to, this class is a weird class with weird cirrocumuli, but she does it well, there was a slight shift once everyone was comfortable, we talked about a lot of controversial things, so if you dont like it either dont take her, or dont go to class. but i 100% rec her for this course

Dr. Krone is an energetic, well spoken, and honest professor. While her lessons can get sidetracked by engaging in tangential discussions with stusents, she is clearly passionate and engaged with the ideas and everything the students have to say. She genuinely cares, her lectures are always something to look forward to. Highly advise taking her!

Dr. Krone is empathetic and uses relevant articles to support her lesson plans. She is accessible outside of class and treats all of her students with respect. She encourages a classroom community and creative writing!

Guys. Dr. Krone is literally the best professor at KSU. She genuinely cares about all of her students. She genuinely wants you to succeed and will do anything to prepare you for your future career. Ignore the one mild review she has because if you express any concerns with her she will correct or adjust her lessons to accomodate. 100% take her.

TAKE. DR. KRONE. YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT. i seriously wish i had a chance to take her again. she uses a contract grading system, class discussions are always amazing, and she is such a genuinely kind person. if you have the chance, TAKE HER. i could rave about dr. krone for pages!

this is hands down the best professor i've ever had. she has me so excited for my future career. her class is project heavy but she's an easy grader. she genuinely cares about her students and wants everyone to exceed. i'm taking her again next semester and i'm super excited for her class! definitely take her if you're able to!

I absolutely love Dr. Krone. I took about a year off of classes because of health issues and she welcomed me back to school with so much energy. Her class is one of the best I've ever taken and am 100% taking her again. Her class is discussion based and very easy to follow. Her slide decks are well organized and clear on what the homework is.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Krone is amazing beyond words. Legit, my favorite professor ever. 10/10

Dr. Krone is down to Earth and likes her students to participate through written reflections and discussions in class. The first part of her class was great, very inviting, but then once she was comfortable with her students, all we talked about was politics. I thought it was extremely inappropriate for an English Education class.
